analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: 23.33. Micchattaniyatattika, Kusalattika🔽Namicchattaniyataṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā sammattaniyato kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha …pe… avigate cha.🔽Namicchattaniyataṁ naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā micchattaniyato akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha …pe… avigate cha.
analyzed: kusala ttika  na micchatta niyatam na kusalam dhammam paccayā sammatta niyataḥ kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā cha pe avigate cha  na micchatta niyatam na akusalam dhammam paccayā micchatta niyataḥ akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā cha pe avigate cha

original: Namicchattaniyataṁ naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca aniyato abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… avigate cha.
analyzed: na micchatta niyatam na abyākatam dhammam paṭicca aniyataḥ abyākataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā cha adhipatiyā cha pe avigate cha
